channel.title: 639 Curse prayer command

item.title: 639 Curse prayer command
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

639 – Switching to curses – This command should switch my prayers to curses, but for some reason it does not?

[code]if (command[0].equals(“curses”)) {
player.getPrayer().setAnctientCurses(
Boolean.parseBoolean(command[1]));
ActionSender.sendConfig(player, 1584, player.getPrayer()
.isAncientCurses() ? 1 : 0);
}

[/code]

Read full topic
